text: Upper Saxon (, ; ) is an dialect spoken in Saxony, southeastern Saxony-Anhalt, and eastern Thuringia. Though called "Saxon", it is not to be confused with Low Saxon. Upper Saxon is linked to the Thuringian dialect. ==Subgroups== The subgroups for Upper Saxon German. *Meissen dialect *North Upper Saxon *Erzgebirgisch ==References== Category:German dialects Category:Languages of Germany Category:Saxony Category:Saxony-Anhalt Category:Thuringia
title: Upper Saxon German
